title: Home mortgage debt of households and nonprofit organizations in the U.S. 2012 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Debt in trillion U.S. dollars for 31 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q3 2019 has the highest Debt in trillion U.S. dollars and Q3 2014 has the lowest Debt in trillion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Debt in trillion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Quarter is 1.08.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Debt in trillion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Quarter Q3 2019 has the highest Debt in trillion U.S. dollars and Q3 2014 has the lowest Debt in trillion U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Debt in trillion U.S. dollars for 31 number of Quarters.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Debt in trillion U.S. dollars for 31 number of Quarters.
The maximum Debt in trillion U.S. dollars 10.52 is found at Quarter Q3 2019 and the minimum is found at Q3 2014 where Quarter is 9.44.
Quarter Q2 2019 has the second highest value for Debt in trillion U.S. dollars.
There is a difference of 1.08 between the maximum Quarter Q3 2019 and minimum Quarter Q3 2014.
Quarter Q3 2019 is higher than any other Quarters with value 10.52, followed by Q2 2019, and Q1 2019. Down to Quarter Q3 2014 with the lowest value 9.44.
The Debt in trillion U.S. dollars has declined over the past 31 Quarters.
Quarter Q2 2015, Q3 2013, and Q2 2013 have a similar Debt in trillion U.S. dollars that is 9.49.
The Quarter Q3 2019 has 1.08 times more Debt in trillion U.S. dollars than average.
